thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Martin Marietta Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.88 Excluding Items

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Martin Marietta Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.88 Excluding Items
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Martin Marietta Materials Inc:
* MARTIN MARIETTA REPORTS RECORD FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.88 EXCLUDING ITEMS * REAFFIRMS GUIDANCE OF MID-SINGLE-DIGIT GROWTH IN 2018 AGGREGATES SHIPMENTS
* QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE ‍$5.95​ * QTRLY CONSOLIDATED TOTAL REVENUES $970.5 MILLION VERSUS $948.8 MILLION
* 2017 FOURTH-QUARTER, FULL-YEAR RESULTS HAS 1-TIME, NON-CASH BENEFIT OF $258.1 MILLION DUE TO TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT OF 2017
* SEES 2018 CAPEX $450 MILLION TO $500 MILLION * SEES 2018 TOTAL REVENUES OF $4,160 MILLION TO $4,355 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.47, REVENUE VIEW $921.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $4.09 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
